keyPolicies.policyDescription: Dominic has always promoted the conservation of the local environment. Successfully campaigning against the construction of the first concrete water covering of the Stoke Poges reservoirs. Green Belt policy continues to be a personal battle, as does protection from the noise of the M4 and aircraft. He opposed the proposed third lane on the M40 which he believed would cause environmental damage and distress.

Dominic has been closely involved in national policy formulation, on Voluntary Euthanasia, Fraud and Abuse of the Honors system. His responsibilities as Shadow Home Secretary have given him a wide insight into national policing and the operation of the criminal courts. He played a key part in the opposition that has so far defeated the proposal for ID cards.
